name: Uninhabited
description:
Uninhabited is a survival rogue-like where you are stranded on an island and need to survive until rescue arrives.

The chance of being rescued will increase with expanding your survival camp and lighting a big torch. To have a big, highly visible flame at the top of the torch, you'll need to find, use and activate artifacts, pieces of old tech and live in harmony with nature.

Also, don't forget to survive. You need drinks, food and sleep if you want to be rescued sane, or at all!
